title: Job Cuts Climb as Labor Economy Workforce Trades Down
description: A trio of labor reports, spanning government, private sector data and PYMNTS Intelligence findings, shows that uncertainty is rising among hourly workers even as their spending continues. Jobless claims are at a three-year low, but companies are planning more…
